plugin.name: TTS_NVDA
plugin.author: Tyler Spivey
plugin.purpose: Plugin for the NVDA screen reader

muclient.script: tts_enabled = true function OnPluginInstall () assert(package.loadlib("tts_NVDA.dll", "luaopen_audio"))() nvda.say("NVDA test plugin initialized") end function OnPluginScreendraw(t, log, line) if not tts_enabled then return end --tts off -- checking for an empty string, or a string composed only of spaces. -- If we don't, NVDA says blank. if (t == 0 or t == 1) and not line:find("^%s*$") then nvda.say(line) end end --function function TTSToggle (name, line, wc) if tts_enabled then tts_enabled = false nvda.say("speech off") else tts_enabled = true nvda.say("speech on") end end function OnPluginTabComplete(word) if tts_enabled then nvda.stop() nvda.say(word) end end
